text: Ba cazoi a'moli ancom dodaason (munofiqon) ʙojad ki andak ʙixandand va ʙisjor ʙigirjand! (Ja'ne, dar in dunjoi guzaro ʙahramand savand va ʙa lazzathoi on xushol savand, zud ast, ki ʙisjor ʙigirjand dar azoʙi dardnok ʙa saʙaʙi on ci kasʙ kardaand dar dunjo az kufru nifoq va nofarmonii amri Parvardisrason)
